alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 28 at 9:13PM MST until June 28 at 11:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1145 PM MST. * At 913 PM MST, emergency management reported ongoing flash flooding across Stockton Hill Road at Vock Wash from earlier heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of washes and roads as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Stockton Hill Road at Vock Wash FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
